BAJAJ FINANCE CEO ON AI IMPACT 

Al listened to 2 cr calls, converted voice to text, and gave us data. 

Text-to-data conversion happened for 5.2 lakh customers. As a result, we generated 100,000 new offers for which we did not have information earlier. 

This capability did not exist in Q1 and Q2. It just got deployed. 

We'll be able to listen to 100 million calls next year. Loan disbursements through Al-powered call centres stood at about ‚Çπ1,600 cr, that's 10% of the ‚Çπ16,545 cr of disbursals in Q3FY26. 

Data from those calls led to another ‚Çπ325 cr of volumes. So, this is just our first attempt

BAJAJ FINANCE ACCELERATES AI TRANSFORMATION ‚Äì Q3 CONCALL HIGHLIGHTS  

Voice AI Revolution  
-  Analyzed 2 Cr calls via voice-to-text conversion for 5.2 lakh customers.  
-  Generated 100,000 new offers from previously unavailable data.  
-  Deployed newly in Q3; scales to 100 Mn calls next year.  

Disbursement Impact  
-  AI-powered call centers drove ‚Çπ1,600 Cr (~10% of Q3‚Äôs ‚Çπ16,545 Cr total disbursals).  
-  Call data unlocked additional ‚Çπ325 Cr in volumes ‚Äì early proof of concept.  

Autonomous Agents Expansion  
-  Plans 800+ agents across sales, operations, HR, IT, risk, and DMS by next fiscal.  

Content & Engagement AI  
-  100% videos (2.7 lakh) and banners (1.2 lakh) now AI-generated.  
-  11 live AI text BOTs replace SMS for customer interaction across 11 products.  
-  All 26 products get conversational BOTs by April-May 2026 ‚Äì zero non-AI comms.  

Identity & Onboarding AI  
-  46 Mn face matches for existing customers enhance identity control.  
-  Auto-extracts data from 43 documents (PAN, Aadhaar etc.) at 95-96% accuracy.  
-  Auto quality checks hit 41%; targeting 85-90% in 15 months.  

Development Efficiency  
-  AI delivers 25-45% efficiencies in tech development (up to 47% on digital infra).  

Key Takeaway: *Bajaj Finance‚Äôs aggressive AI scaling across voice, content, and operations positions it for structural efficiency gains and competitive dominance.*

ANUPAM RASAYAN CLEARS $50 MN FUNDING FOR US ACQUISITION VIA OVERSEAS STRUCTURE  

Global Expansion Step  
-  Acquires 100% stake in Doriath (Luxembourg) and 15% in Batam, creating a holding structure for overseas operations.  

US Acquisition Route  
-  Rights to acquire Monitchem Kansas (US) assigned to Doriath, which will execute the planned international acquisition.  

$50 Mn Funding Plan  
-  USD 20 Mn credit facility for Doriath.  
-  USD 30 Mn External Commercial Borrowing (ECB) from Axis Bank & consortium lenders.  

Collateral & Security Setup  
-  Board approved mortgage, hypothecation, pledges, and corporate guarantees to secure the above funding.  

Strategic Rationale  
-  Strengthens global expansion and specialty chemical presence through inorganic growth.  
-  Positions the company for enhanced international footprint and client reach.  

Financial Implication  
-  Positive Long-Term Impact ‚Äì aids growth and global visibility, though near-term leverage may rise.  

Key Takeaway: *This move signals Anupam Rasayan‚Äôs strategic shift toward global scale and US market entry through a structured, funded acquisition path.*
